plot: Follow-up to the TV trilogy "Heimat", this time for cinemas, set again in the fictional village Schabbach in the Hunsrück region of Rhineland-Palatinate.
title: Die andere Heimat - Chronik einer Sehnsucht
plot_es: Follow-up to the TV trilogy "Heimat", this time for cinemas, set again in the fictional village Schabbach in the Hunsrück region of Rhineland-Palatinate.
original_name: Die andere Heimat - Chronik einer Sehnsucht
